mods.abstract: Runaway in Jail. Was brought to the Jail of this Parish, a runaway negro boy, named SAMBO, who says he belongs to Mr. Joe Fisher of Rapides; is about 22 years old; 5 ft. 7 in. high; well built; very black; has no beard; The owner will please come forward, pay charges and take him away. THEO. BLANCHARD, Sheriff jan21

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
